attributes.action: Stop disrupting children's education with isolation from covid tests
attributes.additional_details: Stop disrupting children's education by making them self isolate every time their is a positive test in their bubble. They are missing too much education because of a flawed testing system
attributes.background: Stop disrupting children's education by using covid tests that are inaccurate

rejection.details: Since you started your petition the Government has announced that guidance for schools and rules regarding self-isolation for under 18s are changing, to reduce the need for school children to self-isolate. You can find out more about this here: https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/999798/Actions_for_early_years_and_childcare_providers_during_the_COVID-19_pandemic.pdf
